title: NEW SERVER FOR Middle East and IRAN
body:
Hello

player from iran usually play in EA and their ping is about 120 - it's not good but player are really good and professional.

why you dont run server in IRAN ?

you know how many player from iran , they need server.

we have best data center in IRAN , we have developer team for run this if you want.

please do this and run LOL server in iran for player.

thank you

replies.body: I definitely get your passion and where you are coming from.  We are constantly on the look out of where we can create a new region/server, but as of right now, we don't have any current plans :(

Hello again.
i am from IRAN, but i am in Germany now and we can see each other in your office,
Do you know how many user log in and play from IRAN ?! 

in IRAN is best data center with best hardware and software,
i can do every thing that you need for this,

if you run server in Iran player from middle east can join this server,

i am wait for your Opinion 

thank you

> [{quoted}](name=Hapli,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ksqtVEGE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-24T05:09:38.011+0000)
